personalInfo.name: Giorgio
personalInfo.myDescription: Passionate web developer, making useful application using the latest technologies!

responsabilities: Technical Designer and Java Developer in Italian and European research
projects such as 'Multicast Multimedia Mobile Services (M3CAST)' to provide
unified and convergent services over DVB / UMTS / WiFi networks and
FP7 Project 'Smart hoMes for ALL' (SM4ALL), in which I have designed and
developed the Orchestration Engine and Rule Engine components.
Responsible for web ecommerce designing and maintaining.
Graphic design (Adobe Photoshop and Adobe Illustrator).
